website_summaries.verdict: A primer that blurs imperfections so effectively, you won't even need foundation.
pros: Primer glides on smoothly like a moisturizer
Effectively blurs pores and fine lines and has a beautiful matte finish
Sits well under a range of foundations, or wears well on its own for a natural look
Comes in a pack of 2 or 3
cons: Be careful not to apply too thick of a layer, as it may cause the product to flake

customer_reviews.title: The best silicone primer on a budget
customer_reviews.text: If you like smashbox clear primer than you’ll love this. In my opinion it’s not as long wearing as smashbox when it comes to keeping my face matte because my nose and cheeks still get oily but for this price I’m not mad at it. ***make sure you clean your face before bed because it is a thick primer and will clog those pores***
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Rosee

customer_reviews.title: Great price and a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I spread it all over then get extra and pat into my larger pores, to set (it's very silicone) I spray it with my nyx matte setting spray. After that it looks great under makeup and even works for my very oily skin. (White shirt with black shirt without)
customer_reviews.author: Mase.coyote

customer_reviews.title: Grease in a tube- go get NYX Pore Filler instead
customer_reviews.text: I really like NYX's Pore Filler, but I heard people endorse this, so I thought I'd give it a try. At first try, I found it to be greasy, kind of separated. Reminded me a little of petroleum jelly. I tried it, but it was not great. I figured the first application might have had settled or not been true to the product, so I tried two other times. Both gave greasy, oily results on my normal to oily skin.The majority of mine went to the trash. It wasn't worth it, and I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: World History Teacher Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very slick and oily. Like pure silicone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an attempted "dupe" to Benefit Porefessional and epically failed. I am not sponsored or in association with Benefit at all. The foundation just looks patchy and separated when applied on top of this foundation. I feel like I'm applying straight silicone to my face and it's so oily and thick and honestly a little gross. I know people really like it and I wish I could too because of how affordable it is but unfortunately it just doesn't work for me. I should also mention that I have dry skin so I really don't think it would work on oily skin because of the aforementioned texture. Sorry! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed no difference at all in the appearance of my skin or pores. I wasn't expecting a miracle, and my pores aren't huge to begin with, but this product did literally nothing. Plus, the consistency of this product is similar to Vaseline/petroleum jelly, and makes applying makeup evenly a little more difficult. It also seems to cause my makeup to not last as long in warmer weather. Judging by the many positive reviews here, this product obviously works really well for a lot of people, but I didn't care for it, and wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people said that it was like the porefessional but it's not even close to that one. It feels like petroleum jelly, it is greasy and doesn't help with pores or makeup; when I put the foundation on it looked really bad, it never dries so I had greasy face all day. After using it two times my face broke out horrible. I will never buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Tule

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I did not like the primer(s) I was currently using, they did not look good with my foundation. Maybelline Baby Skin Instant Pore Eraser Primer was an answer to a prayer! the description says it can be used under makeup or alone. I have tried it both ways and it looks fabulous and dose what it says it will do, with regard to making enlarged pores seem to almost disappear! I like it so much I bought it again just to make sure I will always have it on hand! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MzSoCali2U

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with my foundation instead of putting it on first. Then I put my powder foundation over it and it looks flawless. ***update: just purchased for a third time. Still love this stuff! I'm so glad I bought this on a whim at the grocery store many months back. I now get it on Amazon for much cheaper but it is the perfect addition to smoothing out makeup with large pores or small wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: Cherries27

customer_reviews.title: Baby Skin > Benefit's Porefessional
customer_reviews.text: I've recently discovered this primer. Sucks cuz I worked backward and started with the expensive, "luxury" brands and ended up wasting a lot of money. A friend of mine told me to try Baby Skin, and I was skeptical because my skin is so oily and scarred from my teenage acne years. Obviously I took her advice and I was amazed. I'd went from so many high end primers not working, to a lil cheap one that put them all to shame! CRAZY! This stuff works so well for me, it pretty much erased my huge pores. It reminded me of Benefits Porefessional, at a fraction of the cost. Try it, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Ober

customer_reviews.title: Great primer at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Yes, finally a primer that goes on clean and does one heck of a job. For the money, you can't beat it. And I don't think any higher priced primers would do any better than this primer does. Also, you can see how much product you are getting. There are some other products that are very deceiving. you think you're ordering a full jar and you get a jar with a little scooped out hole where the fluid actually is. A little goes a long way with this product, and it feels wonderful on my skin. I am very satisfied with this product and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: EmmagirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the high price for this. It is very thick but doesn't really cover pores. I guess if you cake it on it will work but the tube is way to small to pile it on. For now I will stick to elf and believe it or not Mederma. It's made for chafing but think about it The consistency is light and perfect on your inner thigh. Imagine how soft and comfortable it is on your face as a primer. The price is also perfect and it is a larger tube.
customer_reviews.author: majestic

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! I'm blown away by what this product can do. It seems to minimize, and even completely erase the pores on my face! I am so glad I took a chance on this product, I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Chiles

customer_reviews.title: Was doubtful, but now, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews before purchasing, some complaining it's oily, thick like vaseline, made their face break-out. I found this product pretty close to perfect. I have sensitive skin. Prone to break-outs, largish pores, starting to get a little crepey and I think it's wonderful. The price is great and the amount you get for this price is generous. Quit second guessing and buy it. It's okay, really.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Greasy and weird
customer_reviews.text: This stays slick and greasy for several hours . It is not superior for pores or make up application, it’s a strange substance. I’d hoped it was an economic alternative to smash box or veil but it is not . I used it then had to leave the house and realized how terrible my face felt and I could not wash it off for several hours, but I certainly craved getting it off me. It did NOT cause any sensitivity -Or any reaction- it was just significantly unpleasant, slick and heavy feeling. I have normal skin . I suggest try a sample or small size, it may work for you . I threw my two pack away.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Pie

customer_reviews.title: In love with this primer
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this primer because it does what it claims to do. I love how it covers up my pores (I have rather large pores around the cheeks) and my foundation lasts long sweaty days, I do pair it with setting powder and that's lasts like forever I'm giving it 4 stars just because my face kinda feels slippery after putting this, sorta feels like vaseline (I guess it's because of the consistency) and because it is kinda hard to blend all over my face. Overall an excellent primer, and for that price? Honestly a no brainer. Definitely would buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalye Deras

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pore eraser for a inexpensive price - and no skin sensitivity or acne side effects
customer_reviews.text: This pore minimizer is amazing. All use a form of silicone to blur pores, no need to pay more for a high end brand. I use alone or mix with a light weight foundation or bronzer, which I pay more for since I am brand loyal to Chanel for both their water based foundation (only one I found that matches skin tone B12 or B22 has slight pink beige tone) and love their liquid bronzer too. So I highly recommend to mix or layer with your favorite moisturizer, foundation or bronzer. And surprisingly the small tube lasts a long time. I am happy I gave this product a try, now it is included in my subscribe and save deliveries.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Kouveliotes

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE FOR OILY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin even more oily AND caused my makeup to move or shift. I do makeup for weddings and special events and would NOT recommend this for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is better than ELF because its cheaper and the ELF primer ...
customer_reviews.text: This feels identical to ELF primer and Smashbox! This product is better than ELF because its cheaper and the ELF primer only uses 20% of its bottle! If you open up ELF Primer, there is a small container inside the bottle and you're paying so much for a product that will last you only a month. Now, this is not quite as good as Smashbox, but it is a great alternative for someone on a budget! Your skin and your makeup will feel like heaven the first time you use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Not sure its for me or my skin....
customer_reviews.text: I don't have extremely obvious pores but wanted to try this to see if my makeup (and skin) looked any better. I'd say I have combination skin now in my mid-30s and try to keep my skin moisturized. This product definitely does that. I didn't notice a huge difference in my appearance but was happy with the product..... Until I started noticing random breakouts - very bottom of jawline, middle of cheek, etc. They were popping up each day in places I don't normally break out so I stopped using it. I wish I knew which ingredient doesn't agree with me....as I seem a bit sensitive to certain compact foundations and sunscreens. At least my skin is clearing up now.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Does what is says!
customer_reviews.text: So I have HUGE pores (insert crying face....with tears coming out of my pores). This product really does seal up the pores and leaving skin an even textured canvas for your foundation. I can’t say enough about how it also softens the feel of your face, “baby skin” is definitely true. You don’t need too much, I honestly don’t like to pile stuff on my face so I use it on where my pores are most noticeable, which are my nose and middle cheek area, once I apply my make up my pores are virtually gone. I will buy again. Hope my review helped others!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella daza

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily T-Zones
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try out a new primer after running out of the previous one I had before. I find my skin was smoother and makeup glided over it so nicely. There has been no issues with irritation. I have used the Smashbox primer which I feel this is the dupe for. I can't complain since I feel it does basically the same. I work 10hr days at a salon which means I am running around all the time and when I'm not using this my makeup does break apart. I have an extremely oily T-Zone and this helps control it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen A

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!
customer_reviews.text: 6/18/20 - Update, After a couple months, I decided that I don't like this primer as a primer...it does leave a silky smooth finish on your face but it does nothing for holding makeup and after a couple of hours I am having to blot the oil from my nose and forehead...leaves me very oily when naturally I am not an oily person.. Original Post: This primer feels so dreamy! Super Silky Smooth leaving your face so velvety! It instantly reminded me of Smashbox Silky Smooth Primer
customer_reviews.author: Gina Salinas

customer_reviews.title: It's Disturbs Meh
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is alomst like Vaseline, I really don't know why ladies like it :( ..It does nothing for pores and my makeup will immediatley rub off if touched when I apply this Primer first.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my high end primer for this!
customer_reviews.text: I am an aspiring MUA and I love high end products. I've heard a friend raving about this drug store product so I had to give it a try. So glad I did! It's an amazing make up primer or great moisturizer to wear alone. Makes your skin so soft and ready makea your makeup apply smoother so you use less foundation! This has replaced my high end primer and my husband's pocket book is thankful! Will purchase again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is defiantly not as good as benefit pore fessional but it isn’t terrible at all for the price. I actually prefer it over my BECCA primer! It does help blur my pores and I honestly I have HUGE pores. I will also say that my makeup doesn’t settle in my pores more throughout the day like it usually does. I also like that it feels so light and it doesn’t have a strong smell. I have included a picture of my cheeks with and without makeup for comparison!
customer_reviews.author: Carrisa Ammons

customer_reviews.title: feels good
customer_reviews.text: Being clear, I didn't see how it would erase pours, but after putting it on, I was surprised at how well it did cover/erase. I am 66 yrs old so my pours have been around awhile. Even after looking in the magnified side of my mirror, you could see them if your up close but at and average distance, really un-noticeable, plus it made my skin in general look smooth and soft without any make up. I would definitely recommend it to others and purchase it again myself. Sherrie
customer_reviews.author: Larry/Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Better than MAC, smash box, makeup forever and alot of other primers ive tried
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this primer a long time ago, it does a better job at blurring pores than any other primer ive used. I've had ipsy for years and I've tried many different high-end primers but i still always like this one the best. Its harder for me to find in stores now so I was very pleased to see i could get it here. It feels like baby powder in gel form its clear of course but when you smooth it on your skin it feels sooo soft. I bought a tube of this for my guy friend too and he uses it to make his skin look better without looking like hes wearing anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: brandon hammack

customer_reviews.title: All dimethicone
customer_reviews.text: This feels like I'm slathering grease on my skin and I saw no noticeable reduction in pores or change in skin texture. I'm fairly certain it actually made me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This works it works great!! I'm not wearing anything other than the primer in the picture! I have sensitive skin and this doesn't have any bad effects on my skin! I love it! My skin looks so smooth and soft!! And once it's on and rubbed in, it's not even noticeable to the touch! My skin looks better than ever, I was using an expensive primer but was running low so I grabbed this one, and ITS BETTER!! 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Minimized pores and dry patches significantly!
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it would help with my dry patches and this is one of the first products that I've seen do so. Any time I wear makeup, regardless of brand, dry scaly patches show up underneath and its horrendous. This not only minimized my large pores but also helped big time with those ugly patches. It didnt erase those patches entirely, but this product isnt necessarily for that, so it was a pleasant surprise for me personally. I did notice my skin felt more moisturized for longer when using this versus just using regular lotion. It did not make me feel oily or greasy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. By the way I am a man and cross-dressing is a hobby. I hate it how when I put on foundation and concealer I'd have these massive holes all in my cheeks and around my nose because my pores are so big. I tried this stuff and was instantly amazing how smooth it made my skin look and then the foundation goes on with no visible pores. I will definitely be buying some more of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily and combination skin so getting anything to stick to my skin by the end of the day is hard to find. I normally use matte full coverage powder and foundation but since after this i no longer use thick coverage because it works very well on diminishing my pores and even filling in my smile lines!! Some days i even just wear this and only some concealer for touch up and im ready to go. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: asianwifey

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this. I normally buy my printer at Ulta but decided to give this a try. Why spend more when it works? Turns out it doesn't come close to the quality which I should have figured. I wouldn't recommend this stuff. Spend the extra bit and get a good one. I guess I can say it's better than nothing at all but only a bit. I have oily skin and that might also be the problem. If you have oily skin, this stuff melts right off and your makeup along with it. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Fills in pores, but may get runny
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to use because it spreads and hides pores well. That being said, applying foundation on top of it is a little tricky as the primer layer can shift around as you're spreading the foundation. After 5-6 hours, things get kind of runny (depending on how active you are) and it's hard to dab some oil or sweat off your face for fear of removing the layers you have on. It's fluidity makes it able to fill in pores well, but that is also it's downside since it doesn't firmly stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally grease in a tube whenever I put under foundation and setting powder my foundation wipes offs sooo easily, so if I sweat a little or just touch my skin you can see my fingerprint on face, one day I had a knitted sweater on and took it off you could see the imprint of the knitted sweater on my face where it wiped off the makeup it’s honestly a waste of money and I want a refund! I’ve been using makeup for a while and have never had a product this bad.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer18

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just signed up for SUBSCRIBE & SAVE. This inexpensive product makes your skin feel like VELVET. I've worn it with/without foundation. I have accidentally fallen asleep whilst wearing this, and no breakouts. Wow, keep a tube in your purse. Ladies, and, Gentlemen, anyone can use this. Why not? This is a crease filler. You will love it!!! I'm hooked. This is a must have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Smiles

customer_reviews.title: No difference with or without it
customer_reviews.text: It feels gentle, but I didn't see a huge difference with or without it. I have some superficial acne scars, nothing too deep, but it made no difference. I love the Maybelline products, but wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Caliandra Olive

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This didn't make my pores less noticeable, in fact, I think it accentuated them because it left my skin greasy, which tends to show pores more. This product is good if you want a shiny face. I'll be heading right back to one that costs a bit more, but actually works - Elf Poreless Face Primer.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne McCann

customer_reviews.title: Didnt Work
customer_reviews.text: It feels great on your skin but it blends with foundation instead of staying put which defeats the purpose. I even tried waiting 15 mins before applying anything else to see if it would set. It was a no go :(
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid dupe but not as effective in coverage
customer_reviews.text: Definitely was a solid dupe for some of the other pore perfecting products. When I have make up over it, I got the job done. It was clear and went on pretty smooth. It wasn’t as great as some of the higher end products but it is great for its drugstore value and will be affective at its job. One complaint that I had was that if you don’t wear make up, you won’t see much of a difference. This is more of a gray primer for under your make up then for just trying to minimize the size of your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works on all skin tones, light to dark
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many similar products, this is colorless, so it works on all skin tones. It can be worn alone, for an airbrushed-perfect, no-makeup look, or under foundation as a primer. It's weightless and it doesn't feel like you're wearing anything; but it gives skin a beautiful evenness. Even hides mild acne scarring. (It might work on deeper acne scars, we don't know.)
customer_reviews.author: A.E. and Z.A.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works and im happy about it.
customer_reviews.text: It really does completely cover my pores completely. Ive only been outting it on my nose but I think im gonna start applying it lightly all over my face. My pores arent huge at all and they arent an issue on my whole face, but I like how my makeup looked once i put my foundation over it. It does give you a light photoshop look lol.
customer_reviews.author: MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Erases fine lines
customer_reviews.text: I can literally see my lines on my face disappear as I apply this prior to my make up. It’s hands down the best.
customer_reviews.author: Canned fish

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I have extremely large pores and this helps tremendously to minimize. In the before photo I have none in and no foundation. Second photo is with product and thin layer of foundation. My skin feel SO soft! Will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Army

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Impressive. I have pretty visible pores, so thought I'd try it. I'm definitely happy with the results for the small price. It did a pretty decent job smoothing out my pores. Picture is with primer and thin layer of foundation I have sensitive skin with an allergy to scents, and I had zero trouble wearing this for 6+ hours When I run out (which this tube will last me quite a while) I'll definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Smashbox primer
customer_reviews.text: This is silicon-based just like the famous Smashbox primer (but minus the price tag) - meaning it's perfect for anyone with oily/combination skin & large pores like me! I don't often but drugstore makeup, but I decided to try this out and I'm actually impressed - it glides onto the skin smoothly, and covers large pores + helps keep you matter throughout the day. All in all, happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Just don't like the product
customer_reviews.text: Just don't like the product, personally. My rating has nothing to do with the seller or Amazon. Bith we're great. I just dont think it works for my dry skin, but I have a sister and friend who love this product. So I think it's a individual thing. Not for those with dry skin, in my opinion. It makes my make-up matte and patchy. Amazing delivered it was intact, package well and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jaelle

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this was very moisturizing and it definitely made my skin feel soft, but it seemed to make lines stand out. I felt like it caked in any lines making them stand out. It also probably has to do with the fact I don't like to use a lot of make up, I just do better with moisturizer and powder foundation honestly. This may work good for others but just isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticks in pores
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cheap primer just to wear for work but it’s not even good for that. It sinks into all of my pores and shows them more. It’s also very slipper and not gripping to the makeup at all. When I put my liquid foundation on, it’s as if they mix together instead of sitting on top of each other. I guess I’ll stick to my expensive ones for work and play.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Cronk

customer_reviews.title: Pores who??
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I like to think of it as a magic eraser. I unfortunately have larger pores and like to be able to have a smoother appearance if I wear makeup. Put a little of this on and let it sit for a few, then you are good to go! It almost seems like it is a little too fake to me.. Like a silicone consistency, but I supposed that is the point. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F

customer_reviews.title: I plan to continue buying this!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this when I got it. Not for any particular reason. Maybe because it’s so inexpensive.. I use it every single day and my makeup looks great and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Steff8722

customer_reviews.title: Better than many expensive primers
customer_reviews.text: I have used every top-rated luxury cosmetic primer on the market and this one is better than most - maybe all of them. The trick is to use a small amount and LET IT DRY COMPLETELY before makeup application. No scent, not greasy. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: jsd

customer_reviews.title: You don’t get much, but it’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I can see where people say it’s like petroleum jelly, kinda. It’s clear, and kinda oily. But not when it goes on. It’s super soft. I have very dry skin around my dermal between my eyes, and on my nose, which makes makeup look flakey and awful. But this stuff is amazing! I wish it came with more, but I’ll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best primer I’ve used so far, but I need to learn not to use so much. You only need a tiny bit to cover your entire face! The texture feels oily like it will make your face greasy, but I swear it melts right into your skin, and it shouldn’t feel oily if you use a quality setting powder. You definitely need to make sure to scrub it all off at the end of the day though or you might break out a bit the next day. I’ve learned this is pretty typical of primers though because they clog pores.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Baby Soft Feel and Look!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived very quickly and as described. The product is clear and goes on clear, it has the consistency of gel. I only had to use a small amount on my nose and cheeks to blur the look of my pores and they did not get clogged up. I keep this handy in my bag and apply as needed. Happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Caused redness/slight burns on fave
customer_reviews.text: I heard good things about this and thought I would try as I currently dont have a primer in my routine. While it didnt burn my skin, it left redness every place I applied the primer. It looks like I got a sunburn. It didn't necessarily cover up my pores and was very slick/didnt rub into my face well and so even with setting spray I would touch my face and makeup would be on my fingertips. I'm not sure it others had this issue(burned skin) of if I'm an anomaly, but if you even think you have sensitive skin I'd look elsewhere. Thanks for listening to my Ted talk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Im pretty disappointed, i was really hesitant about trying this product, ive never used a primer befor but my pores have gotten lager as I got older and i really wanted aomething to smooth out my skin before putting my foundation on.. It feels nice and silky I did one aide with the pore resucer and the otherside with out and unfortunately i dont see a difference im really bummed out
customer_reviews.author: Jeffnsara

customer_reviews.title: Truly baby skin!
customer_reviews.text: WOW. They aren't kidding. You rub this on your face and it feels SO soft like baby skin! It does a decent job at covering skin imperfections and feels dry after application. For the price, you can't beat it. I gave 4 stars because I found a more expensive one that I like a bit better. But I still highly recommend this one if you're on a budget and want a primer that does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: this is NOT a recommended product! This is especially a no-no if you're ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have oily skin, this is NOT a recommended product! This is especially a no-no if you're also using foundation/concealer. After about four hours, I had new breakouts and my foundation looked oily and as though oil was bleeding through it. The many good reviews caught my attention, but I'm glad I only purchased one tube. I'll stick to Phillips Milk of Magnesia under foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Foy

customer_reviews.title: Works, kinda.
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that compares this product to Benefit Porefessional, and I have to say I don’t really agree. This has a really slick feeling after you put it on which never goes away - kind of a nightmare for oily skin. If used under makeup it can help smooth out pores, but doesn’t do much if used alone. I gave it 3 stars because it doesn’t meet my need (smaller pores without foundation) but it could be great for someone who uses foundation more often. If I were a regular foundation user I would probably add this to my routine, but since I’m not I’ll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: VitaminE

customer_reviews.title: Like a snapchat filter
customer_reviews.text: I am just getting into the world of makeup learning new things every day. with this I could see right away the smoothness it states it does. I like the lightness it leaves on your skin and not that cakey feeling you sometimes get with makeup. There was another review that stated to make sure you remove it before bed because it can clog pores and I use it mainly for my eyes and I felt it dried out around a bit but That could also be the concealer that I used.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great dupe for Pore-fessional if you want to save some major $
customer_reviews.text: Still an OK dupe for Pore-fessional BUTTT I still prefer the latter only because i like the SLIGHT tint of color in theirs VS Baby Skin which is just clear, seems a little greasier to begin with and doesn’t just soak right into your skin like Benefit’s does. Pros: definitely hides pores. does not break my sensitive skin out. lasts long. makes stick foundation apply SO much easier. Smells nice, not weird like some stuff. Cons: Clear, no hint of nude color like Benefit. slightly gel-like/greasy consistency which, if you’re used to Benefit, might be weird.
customer_reviews.author: Kinley Fairweather

customer_reviews.title: Caked my foundation around my nose and chin. Not a problem I have ever had before using this.
customer_reviews.text: At bed this does nothing good for you. At worse it bakes you skin really oily. I wear thin formula foundation and wanted something to just smooth texture and this didn't work at all. If anything it makes the texture more noticeable (and I don't have a lot...). Also my skin does not tend to get oily but after about six hours I notice that I need to blot my face. By the end of the day I could feel my foundation caked with oil around my nose and chin.... Worst product I've used. And I did use this in several different ways over the course of a few weeks. Could not make it useable. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: After applying it does make my skin feel soft, smooth, and hides my pores. A few hours later that soft smooth feel is gone and my pores are visible. When I put foundation on top in a few hours the makeup and pores are a blotchy mess. I will put this stuff on if I'm only running to the store and don't want to put on a full load of makeup. I have used other pore eraser primers that work a lot better than this brand.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: A positive experience
customer_reviews.text: After I applied this to my face, it made my face so soft & more smoother. I didnt see the matte staying for a long time & thts with a finishing spray. And I wish it were a larger bottle, but a little goes a long way. Maybe nxt time I apply it n4 I put on mu mkeup, I'll apply a little bit more than I had the 1st using it. But I recommend the seller & this product.
customer_reviews.author: FREDRICKA

customer_reviews.title: Good but not best for moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: It is the best for the money for sure. Works as a great base and I wouldn't necessarily say it erases my pores but I have big pores so it definitely works. I gave 4 stars for moisturizing because I don't think it is seeing how I have dry patches and it doesn't do much for them. But I've only been using it for a short time so I could be wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: WORKS ON OILY SKIN DONT MIND OTHER REVIEWS SAYING IT DOES NOT WORK ON OILY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: i dont know what ppl are talking about that this product isnt for oily skin. i have VEEEERRRY oily skin. and this stuff just works!!!! keeps me matte and removes the shine off my face i use it even without makeup to tone down my shiny face.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B

customer_reviews.title: Will Purchase Consistently from Here Out, Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Baby Skin is meant in the literal sense, i’m not sure I trust it as a primer, but I’m putting it on after I do my normal primer and love how it makes my skin feel and look. It’s not overly greasy nor does it give you a complete matte sheen either. I’ve not before had a product achieve this softness before on my face and with such little product used..ON TOP OF PRICE POINT..it’s a no brainer, no regrets buy and worth a consistent spot in any routine.
customer_reviews.author: SvngPvtRyan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but best left to the large more areas only.
customer_reviews.text: I like this primer for my t-zone. As a full face primer, it is a bit too slick for foundation to really sink into the skin for thst natural skin look. I like to use a matte finish primer all over the face, then add this primer to my t-zone. It really helps to float the foundation over the textured area for a smooth look. A solid purchase, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shaida EhlertTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: ... it - it just sits on your face and easily smears your makeup that you put on top of ...
customer_reviews.text: this is NOT a pore-reducer and as one reviewer put it - it just sits on your face and easily smears your makeup that you put on top of it!
customer_reviews.author: sollie park

customer_reviews.title: Good for pores not fine lines.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Spreads nicely. Low price. Blurs pores well. I have sensitive skin and there was no negative reaction due to this product. Cons: I have deep fine lines under my eyes I’ve been trying to mask and this did not help that. Additionally I learned one day when I was running late that if you apply this primer too thick it will flake off during the day (and your make up with it).
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, dry skin, acne, uneven skintone, gets oily after foundation..
customer_reviews.text: Becomes oily after some time and ruines my foundation. Whole face becomes cakey after some hours.. it’s perfect for outdoor winter dry weather short time. I have dry skin i have acne and uneven skin, definitely not for me. At first it was okay but after you layer it with moisturizer and whole skin care routine it comes off. I recommend it for people who don’t have acne, i wish i was one of them. For the price this is a superb product!
customer_reviews.author: N1995

customer_reviews.title: I don't notice any effect from this product
customer_reviews.text: I can't decide on 2 or 3 stars. I like doing positive reviews but this product didn't do anything noticeable. I use it if it's conveniently near me because I'm not throwing it away. And maybe it helps blend my makeup better than my face lotion with spf but I can't see any effect or even a subtle change. I want it to work. Maybe my expectations were too unrealistic but I wanted the pores on my nose to get smaller.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure whether to give this 4 or 5 stars. It mostly delivers on its promise, actually better than I expected. That said, it doesn't erase your big pores like foundation might (I used it without any foundation or concealer over it.) I would definitely recommend it, but don't expect a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: The best primer I’ve tried yet
customer_reviews.text: I’m sort of old and recently found out about primer. This is the second primer I’ve tried. It’s a ton better then my first primer. (Elf) The product actually gives the skin a smooth finish when applied alone. If I’m in a hurry I can put on the primer, hit it with a powder and call it a day. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: it works great
customer_reviews.text: I am sincerely confused when people say they can see no difference perhaps its because I am 60 years old but I see a highly noticeable difference to my skin my pores disappear my skin looks softer and smoother less wrinkles immediately my friend watched me put it on and was so impressed she went right out and purchased some from walmart that same day. I guess each to their own but I think its fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Amber N. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Favorite beauty product!! love this stuff! Would absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: There are very few beauty products I buy again & again and feel are a required part of my 'regime' when putting on make up. This actually might be the only one. I love this stuff. Makes my skin look soft & smooth even if I don't wear make-up for the day. when used as a base for putting foundation on the foundation glides on silky smooth and I find I use much less foundation as allows the coverage to spread perfectly. Love love love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Downey

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: First of all l, let me tell you this product will unfortunately break you out if you have sensitive skin. At first I absolute loved this product but, I would wake up with blemishes the next day. It does cover up pores and leaves your makeup looking matte. Maybe if you do not have sensitive skin this product will work for you . If you have sensitive stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Baby Skin Primer
customer_reviews.text: This is the primer I always use. To be honest, I was a little disappointed that it didnt help much with hiding my pores (I'm beginning to think there isn't a product that will help), but it still works well and I use it every day. Don't expect miracles, but it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. I have combination skin and this just made my oily spots way worse. I tried it with a couple different foundations and with just a setting powder but it just made me extra oily. I'm not going to be able to use it. I did like the texture of it and can see it working for others.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous blur and matte finish
customer_reviews.text: I have problematic skin that i dont always want to cake foundation onto. This is affordable and works wonders! gives you a matte finish with a natural glow to your skin, doesnt dry it out either! I personally love it for everyday wear to just blur some fine lines and protect my skin
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Steele

customer_reviews.title: Nothing spectacular.
customer_reviews.text: This would be good for people with dry skin, perhaps? It feels a little heavy, for me, which is like applying petroleum jelly on your face. It did nothing for my skin and I felt greasy. It's not a primer either and it doesn't really do anything. Don't expect it to last all day, either. Maybe a short evening out like dinner with friends or having family over, but I repeat, it's nothing spectacular and it didn't work wonders for me, if anything at all. You are better off with a real primer.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: A no no for
customer_reviews.text: I just do not like this primer- it is too slick and my makeup moves around. Even with a setting spray. I can’t even draw my eyebrows on because my pencil just glides right off. I can’t line my lips either. My eyeliner comes off and do does my blush. This is some weird stufff
customer_reviews.author: Angel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have oily but also sensitive skin. Found this on amazon and thought I should give it a try. It’s cheaper than Sephora products. Unfortunately, my face is just not compatible with this formula. I feel like it got my face more oily and used only 2 times since purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Does not do anything for the appearance of pores
customer_reviews.text: While it does make your skin feel very soft, it doesn’t do anything at all for the appearance of pores
customer_reviews.author: April L. Swisher

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes your face so soft and smooth. It IS oily and does mix with my makeup in a weird way (not a bad way) but it doesn’t hide my pores any more than any other primer I’ve tried. BUT on days when I want a bare face look... minimal makeup. I use it. I love the silky texture it gives me. A powdery-silky finish
customer_reviews.author: Selflessjen

customer_reviews.title: Feels greasy..NOT greasy
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Ot does feel like a smoother vaseline going on. But it is not greasy or oily. I have a few larger pores and I wish it would fill those in a bit better. But overall I love it
customer_reviews.author: ex2mommy

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product to all my friends who don't use primer. I love this product because it can be used with makeup or as a standalone. Some days I use it just to make my pores look smaller and my skin look a little better when I don't feel like putting any makeup on. When I do apply makeup, it goes on very easily and holds for longer. It lives up to the name "baby skin."
customer_reviews.author: Annie W.

customer_reviews.title: It also helps keep my lipstick from bleeding into the fine lines around my mouth
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product several times since I can no longer find it in local stores. I use it over my moisturizer/sunblock. Cream foundation spreads smoothly over it. It does not block my pores but they are less visible. It also helps keep my lipstick from bleeding into the fine lines around my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W. Plante

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive alternative primer
customer_reviews.text: I have used more expensive primers but when I use a foundation with SPF this does as well as anything I have used. It works well by itself to make me feel prettier around the house in the evenings after my husband gets home when I don’t have makeup on. An inexpensive alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Sharber

customer_reviews.title: Feels Greasy
customer_reviews.text: While the product does moisturize and didn't irritate my skin, it did smooth over my pores and made them appear smaller but it felt very greasy even after applying face powder. I don't like the product because of the greasy feel to it. My face felt like I needed it wash it.
customer_reviews.author: T2shay

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: No words can really describe this product it works miracles amazing way better than high end brands that are price way more and work way less.. ive used really expensive ones and hated them thought twice about this one and so glad I bought it . Leaves toys face smooth and make up applies like butter ! Must try
customer_reviews.author: DAndrea

customer_reviews.title: Pores Be Gone
customer_reviews.text: A Huge Favorite of Mines! This has become my definite go to when I need a quick facial fix. It is almost like photo-shopping. This somehow blurs the image of my pores. It usually lasts me all day. I recommended it to my daughter and it has also become one of her favorites. This small tube can last you a while if you use the correct portion. A little does go a long way. It absorbs very quickly and the effect is almost instantly seen. Not greasy or scented. Leaves your skin feeling extra soft. Overall, I'm impressed and Recommend. This is an inexpensive quick cover up.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Got this primarily to minimize pores. I’ve tried a lot of different primers, and nothing seemed to make a difference. This does minimize my pores. It doesn’t make them vanish, but even making my pores (which I swear are large enough to drive a car through) look smaller is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mom101

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Some African American women like have a hard time finding cosmetics and cosmetic accessories to keep our skin from breaking out because of foundation but THIS is lightweight non greasy and VERY smooth. Let's my skin breathe and I didn't break out into pimples the next morning. Will DEFINITELY purchase this again. I just wish it came in bigger sizes. Its equivalent or better than my Mary K primer and cheaper! I can honestly say from use this is one of the rare fits everyone skin type product I've found without costing me $30 or more. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deridra M.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: It's a small tube, but it goes a long way. You don't need to use much. I love how it glides over my face and feels silky smooth. It also works as good as more expensive products that I've purchased at Sephora. The price is good! I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Work Excellent
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat the price on Amazon. This smoothes out your face so you use less makeup. The appearance of lines, scars & wrinkles diminished. I usually use a half to a whole pump from Kat Von D. Adding this has taken me to a little more than a quarter pump & not ever more than a half. Allow about a minute for it to set before applying makeup.
customer_reviews.author: J. Madison

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this product. It's coverage is amazing. I wouldn't have believed it if I hadn't seen it myself. It smooths my pores and practically makes them disappear. The product feels very soft and smooth when it's on, and I only have to use a pea-sized amount.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: I have very large pores, as well as I tremendous amount of acne scarring. This product works as well as expensive prestigious brands. There isn't a scent which is wonderful as it is a primer and my skin is very sensitive, for the price it's great. I have found my new dedicated primer.
customer_reviews.author: emily_grandusky

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a makeup junkie and honestly this has to be my favorite daily primer by far. The price is amazing and the effect is amazing. I honestly love it and I really don't write reviews. I have recommended it to all my friends and they love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Asalia Quintero

product_meta.title: Maybelline Baby Skin Instant Pore Eraser Primer, Clear, 0.67 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description:
Size:0.67 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Bye-bye pores! You are one second away from smooth, poreless skin. Give your face the perfect face makeup base with Maybelline New York’s iconic Baby Skin Face Primer. The instant skin smoother will erase the look of pores in seconds leaving the skin with a soft matte finish. Our makeup artists conspired with our research labs to create a lightweight and breathable formula that lets makeup glide on and blend beautifully for professional results. The Baby Skin blur cream can be worn alone or under a foundation for a mistake-proof poreless smooth skin.

BRAND STORY
By Maybelline
feature_bullets: Pore minimizer face primer: A pore-blurring makeup primer, Baby Skin goes on like a moisturizer to help create a smooth canvas over which to apply foundation, and leaves the skin looking matte and poreless

Bye bye pores, hello baby skin: Apply primer, face makeup & concealer, or wear primer on a bare face for a low-maintenance look that's smooth, matte & moisturized all day. If you're looking to minimize pores, no more searching. This primer is for you

Best face forward: Maybelline has sheer, medium, and full coverage foundation in liquid, stick, and cushion foundation formulas, and a range of concealers, plus face primers, contour, highlighter, and pressed powder to help you create a perfect canvas

Maybelline has what you need to create any look--foundation, bb creams, concealers & highlighters to create a perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms
Remove maybelline makeup with micellar water: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup

specifications.Manufacturer: Maybelline, Consumer Products Division of L'Oreal USA S/D, Inc.
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
